numContribs.description: Total number of contributions making up a scattering pattern

numReps.description: Number of independent McSAS results to compute, from which averages and uncertainties are estimated

maxIterations.description: Maximum number of iterations allowed before failing.

compensationExponent.description: Compensates the weighting of contributions, default volume-weighted (2/3).

convergenceCriterion.description: Reduced Chi-squared value to reach for optimisation success.

findBackground.description: Adds a constant background level to the model fitting.

startFromMinimum.description: Sets the initial guess to minimal values rather than a uniform dist.

maxRetries.description: When the MC method cannot reach convergence, it will try again this number of times.

autoClose.description: Prevents cluttering the screen with many windows if series are fited

showIncomplete.description: After an interrupted run or an optimization that did not reach convergence, show results anyway.
